title: Vincent Cantoni
text:
Vincent Cantoni (<a href="Laguiole">Laguiole</a>, 10 March 1927 – <a href="Grenade%2C%20Haute-Garonne">Grenade</a>, 28 October 2013) was a French <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who represented <a href="France%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">France national rugby league team</a> in the <a href="1954%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">1954 World Cup</a>. He was the father of the French former rugby union international <a href="Jack%20Cantoni">Jack Cantoni</a>.
Cantoni toured <a href="1951%20French%20rugby%20league%20tour%20of%20Australia%20and%20New%20Zealand">Australia and New Zealand in 1951</a> with the French side.
He died in 2013.
